title: The 13th Prophecy
description: The time has come for Ivy to face her dark fate. There are no other options--she must destroy Kreterus. Failure to destroy him will result in the annihilation of the world we know and Ivy being doomed to reside in the Underworld for eternity.DEMON KISSED SERIES #1. Demon Kissed #2. Cursed #3. Torn #4. Satan's Stone #5. The 13th Prophecy#6. Fall of the Golden Valefar #7. TBAADDITIONAL DEMON KISSED VALEFAR VOLUMES (Demon Kissed Novellas) #1. Valefar Vol. 1 #2. Valefar Vol. 2
author: H.M. Ward
